snippet: Undefeated Constitution will miss the Triple Crown season because of a slight hairline fracture in his front right cannon bone.
abstract: Constitution, undefeated winner of Florida Derby horse race, will miss the Triple Crown races because of slight hairline fracture in his front right cannon bone.
lead_paragraph: Undefeated Constitution will miss the Triple Crown season because of a slight hairline fracture in his front right cannon bone.

headline.main: Florida Derby Winner to Miss Kentucky Derby
